name: Color Pool
description:
Color Pool

This is my first game, made as a mission checkpoint in the "Junior Programmer" pathway on Unity's website. It is a casual and not-so-complicated game that took about 6 hours to make because I am still pretty new to Unity

Goal

Put as many balls in their assigned holes in a allocated time. By "assignated" understand that the hole has to bear the same color as the ball (eg.: the 2nd screenshot), otherwise it will lead to a game over.

How to play

Use the directional keys (if you use a AZERTY keyboard, ZQSD are fine as well) to move the ball and lead it towards its designated hole.
